Entry.JapaneseText: 今なら…… クレアさんを迎えに行けそうですね。
Entry.EnglishText: I think now... It is time for you to reunite with Claire.

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、今すぐにでも……迎えにいきたい…… だが、その前にやらなくてはならない事がある。
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah... I want to see her as soon as possible... But before that, I have things I need to do.

Entry.JapaneseText: 世界中の争いを……止める事……？
Entry.EnglishText: You mean...stopping the fighting that's going on all over the world?

Entry.JapaneseText: クレアが……オレのまわりの人たちが、心穏やかに 暮らすために……オレはやらなければならない。
Entry.EnglishText: So that Claire and the other people in my life can live in peace... I have to finish this.
